original: @1b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @1b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: yo g'a ts'arya bh'u mi /
analyzed: yo g'a ts'arya bh'u mi /
translated: Yogācārabhūmi

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa /
translated: The Levels of Yogic Deeds

original: bam po dang po /
analyzed: bam po dang po /
translated: Volume One

original: tshig gi mnga' bdag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: tshig gi mnga' bdag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Mañjuśrī, the youthful one, the lord of speech.

original: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa gang zhe na /
translated: What are the levels of the yogic deeds?

original: de ni sa bcu bdun du blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: de ni sa bcu bdun du blta bar bya ste /
translated: They should be regarded as the seventeen levels.

original: bcu bdun gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu bdun gang zhe na /
translated: What are the seventeen?

original: spyi sdom ni /
analyzed: spyi sdom ni /
translated: The general summary is:

original: rnam shes lnga dang ldan pa dang // yid kyi sa dang gzhan gsum ste //
analyzed: rnam shes lnga dang ldan pa dang // yid kyi sa dang gzhan gsum ste //
translated: The level with five kinds of consciousness, the level of mental consciousness, and three others,🔽With investigation and analysis, and so on, with meditative concentration, and without, with mind, and without mind,

original: rtog dpyod bcas la sogs pa dang // ting 'dzin bcas dang ma yin dang // sems yod pa dang sems med dang // thos dang bsams dang bsgoms pa dang // de bzhin theg pa gsum ldan dang // phung por bcas dang phung med gzhan //
analyzed: rtog dpyod bcas la sogs pa dang // ting 'dzin bcas dang ma yin dang // sems yod pa dang sems med dang // thos dang bsams dang bsgoms pa dang // de bzhin theg pa gsum ldan dang // phung por bcas dang phung med gzhan //
translated: With hearing, contemplation, and meditation, likewise with the three vehicles, with the aggregates, and another without the aggregates.

original: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga dang ldan pa'i sa dang / yid kyi sa dang / rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam gyi sa dang // rtog pa yang med la dpyod pa yang med pa'i sa dang /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga dang ldan pa'i sa dang / yid kyi sa dang / rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam gyi sa dang // rtog pa yang med la dpyod pa yang med pa'i sa dang /
translated: the level associated with the five collections of consciousness, the mental level, the level of reasoning and investigation, the level of no reasoning but only investigation, the level of no reasoning and no investigation,

original: mnyam par bzhag pa'i sa dang / mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa dang / sems yod pa'i sa dang / sems med pa'i sa dang / thos pa las byung ba'i sa dang / bsams pa @2a * //
analyzed: mnyam par bzhag pa'i sa dang / mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa dang / sems yod pa'i sa dang / sems med pa'i sa dang / thos pa las byung ba'i sa dang / bsams pa @2a * //
translated: the level of meditative equipoise, the level of nonequipoise, the level of mind, the level of no mind, the level of what arises from hearing,

original: las byung ba'i sa dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i sa dang / nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / phung po dang bcas pa'i sa dang / phung po med pa'i sa ste /
analyzed: las byung ba'i sa dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i sa dang / nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / phung po dang bcas pa'i sa dang / phung po med pa'i sa ste /
translated: the level of what arises from reflection, the level of what arises from meditation, the śrāvaka level, the pratyekabuddha level, the bodhisattva level, the level with aggregates, and the level without aggregates.

original: sa bcu bdun po de dag ni mdor na rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sa bcu bdun po de dag ni mdor na rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa zhes bya'o //
translated: These seventeen levels are, in brief, called the levels of the spiritual practice.

original: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga dang ldan pa'i sa gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga dang ldan pa'i sa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the stage associated with the five groups of consciousness?

original: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga ste /
translated: It is the five groups of consciousness.

original: ngo bo nyid dang / de dag gi gnas dang / de dag gi dmigs pa dang / de dag gi grogs dang / de dag gi las ni mdor na rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga dang ldan pa'i sa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid dang / de dag gi gnas dang / de dag gi dmigs pa dang / de dag gi grogs dang / de dag gi las ni mdor na rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga dang ldan pa'i sa'o //
translated: In brief, the stage associated with the five groups of consciousness is the intrinsic nature, the basis, the object, the associates and the activity of the five groups of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five groups of consciousness?

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: They are the visual consciousness, auditory consciousness, olfactory consciousness, gustatory consciousness, tactile consciousness and mental consciousness.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is visual consciousness?

original: gang mig la brten nas gzugs so sor rnam par rig pa'o //
analyzed: gang mig la brten nas gzugs so sor rnam par rig pa'o //
translated: It is that which, having the eye as its basis and the visible form as its object, cognizes.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i gnas gang zhe na /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i gnas gang zhe na /
translated: What is the basis of visual consciousness?

original: mig ni lhan cig 'byung ba'i gnas so //
analyzed: mig ni lhan cig 'byung ba'i gnas so //
translated: The eye is its simultaneous basis.

original: yid ni de ma thag pa'i gnas so ;🔽/ sa bon thams cad pa lus len par byed pa /
analyzed: yid ni de ma thag pa'i gnas so ;🔽/ sa bon thams cad pa lus len par byed pa /
translated: The mental faculty is its immediate basis.🔽The store-consciousness is its causal basis.

original: rnam par smin pa bsdus pa kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni sa bon gyi gnas so //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa bsdus pa kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni sa bon gyi gnas so //
translated: The store-consciousness, which is the result of the maturation of all the seeds, is the basis of the seeds.

original: de yang mdor bsdu na gnas rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang mdor bsdu na gnas rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
translated: In brief, it is twofold:

original: gzugs can dang gzugs can ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs can dang gzugs can ma yin pa'o //
translated: with form and without form.

original: @2b de la mig ni gzugs can no //
analyzed: @2b de la mig ni gzugs can no //
translated: The eye is with form.

original: de las gzhan pa ni gzugs can ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa ni gzugs can ma yin pa'o //
translated: The others are without form.

original: mig gang zhe na /
analyzed: mig gang zhe na /
translated: What is the eye?

original: gang 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag rgyur byas pa mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten po gzugs dang ba ste /
analyzed: gang 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag rgyur byas pa mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten po gzugs dang ba ste /
translated: It is the subtle matter which is the support of the visual consciousness and which is made of the four great elements.

original: bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: It is invisible and reacting.

original: yid gang zhe na /
analyzed: yid gang zhe na /
translated: What is the mental faculty?

original: gang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i sngon rol du 'das ma thag pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: gang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i sngon rol du 'das ma thag pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: It is the immediately past consciousness or group of the consciousnesses which is the support of the present consciousness or group of the consciousnesses.

original: sa bon thams cad pa'i rnam par shes pa gang zhe na /🔽sngon gyi spros pa /
analyzed: sa bon thams cad pa'i rnam par shes pa gang zhe na / sngon gyi spros pa /
translated: What is the consciousness which contains all the seeds?

original: dga' ba rgyur gyur pa la brten nas sa bon thams cad pa rnam par smin pa mngon par 'grub pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba rgyur gyur pa la brten nas sa bon thams cad pa rnam par smin pa mngon par 'grub pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the store-consciousness which has been perfumed by the other consciousnesses and contains all the seeds.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the object of visual consciousness?

original: gzugs gang bstan du yod cing thogs pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs gang bstan du yod cing thogs pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: It is visible form which is resistant.

original: de yang rnam pa du ma yod do //
analyzed: de yang rnam pa du ma yod do //
translated: It is of many kinds.

original: mdor na kha dog dang dbyibs dang rnam par rig byed do //
analyzed: mdor na kha dog dang dbyibs dang rnam par rig byed do //
translated: In brief, it is color, shape, and informative action.

original: kha dog gang zhe na /
analyzed: kha dog gang zhe na /
translated: What is color?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is blue,

original: sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang // grib ma dang / nyi ma dang / snang ba dang / mun pa dang / sprin dang / du ba dang / rdul dang / khug rna dang / nam mkha' kha dog gcig pa'o //
analyzed: sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang // grib ma dang / nyi ma dang / snang ba dang / mun pa dang / sprin dang / du ba dang / rdul dang / khug rna dang / nam mkha' kha dog gcig pa'o //
translated: yellow, red, white, shadow, light, brightness, darkness, cloud, smoke, dust, and mist.

original: dbyibs gang zhe na /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: dbyibs gang zhe na / 'di lta ste /
translated: What is shape?

original: ring po dang / thung du dang / lham pa dang / zlum po dang / rdul phra mo dang / rags pa dang / phyal le ba dang / phyal le ba ma yin pa dang / mthon po dang / dma' ba'o //🔽rnam par rig byed gang zhe na /
analyzed: ring po dang / thung du dang / lham pa dang / zlum po dang / rdul phra mo dang / rags pa dang / phyal le ba dang / phyal le ba ma yin pa dang / mthon po dang / dma' ba'o // rnam par rig byed gang zhe na /
translated: It is long, short, square, round, high, low, even, and uneven.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: What is informative action?🔽It is the action of body and voice.

original: len pa dang / 'jog pa dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / de la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: len pa dang / 'jog pa dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / de la sogs pa'o //
translated: taking up, putting down, bending, extending, walking, standing, sitting, lying down, going, coming, looking ahead, looking around, looking behind, looking above, looking below, looking to the right, looking to the left.

original: yang kha dog gang zhe na /
analyzed: yang kha dog gang zhe na /
translated: What is color?

original: gang gzugs dang 'dra ba mig gi rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gang gzugs dang 'dra ba mig gi rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa'o //
translated: It is that which is similar to form and is the object of visual consciousness.

original: dbyibs gang zhe na /
analyzed: dbyibs gang zhe na /
translated: What is shape?

original: gang gzugs rgyas par ring po la sogs par yongs su bcad pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: gang gzugs rgyas par ring po la sogs par yongs su bcad pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: It is the form of an extended object, such as long, etc.

original: rnam par rig byed gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed gang zhe na /
translated: What is intimation?

original: rgyas pa'i gzugs skyes pa 'gags pa de nyid mi mthun pa'i rgyus skyes pa'i phyogs su mi 'byung ba dang / de las gzhan pa'i phyogs su yang /
analyzed: rgyas pa'i gzugs skyes pa 'gags pa de nyid mi mthun pa'i rgyus skyes pa'i phyogs su mi 'byung ba dang / de las gzhan pa'i phyogs su yang /
translated: It is the arising of the form of an extended object, which has arisen and passed away, in a place that is not contiguous with it, by reason of a cause that is not similar to it, and which is either not obstructed or obstructed, near or far, and which does not continue in the same direction.

original: bar du ma chod pa 'am /
analyzed: bar du ma chod pa 'am /
translated: What is non-obstructed?🔽What is obstructed?

original: bar du chod pa dang bcas pa 'am /
analyzed: bar du chod pa dang bcas pa 'am /
translated: What is near?🔽What is far?

original: nye ba 'am ring bar 'byung ba dang / phyogs de nyid du yang mi 'gyur ba 'byung ba ni rnam par rig byed ces bya'o //
analyzed: nye ba 'am ring bar 'byung ba dang / phyogs de nyid du yang mi 'gyur ba 'byung ba ni rnam par rig byed ces bya'o //
translated: What is not in the same direction?

original: de la @3a * //
analyzed: de la @3a * //
translated: The first of these is as follows.🔽🔽

original: kha dog ni snang ba dang gsal ba dang zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: kha dog ni snang ba dang gsal ba dang zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o //
translated: Color is a synonym for appearance and clarity.

original: dbyibs ni rgyas pa dang / ring po dang / thung du zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: dbyibs ni rgyas pa dang / ring po dang / thung du zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o //
translated: Shape is a synonym for long, short, square, round, high, low, even, and uneven.

original: rnam par rig byed ni las dang byed pa dang / spyod pa dang / g-yo ba dang ; yongs su g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ni las dang byed pa dang / spyod pa dang / g-yo ba dang ; yongs su g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o //
translated: Communication is a synonym for action, activity, conduct, movement, and change.

original: kha dog dang dbyibs dang rnam par rig byed thams cad kyang mig gi spyod yul dang / mig gi yul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: kha dog dang dbyibs dang rnam par rig byed thams cad kyang mig gi spyod yul dang / mig gi yul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa dang /
translated: All colors, shapes, and communications are the domain of the eye, the object of the eye, the domain of eye consciousness, the object of eye consciousness, and the focal object of eye consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o //
translated: It is also called the domain of the mental consciousness, the object of the mental consciousness, and the point of reference of the mental consciousness.

original: yang de nyid kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / de gnyi ga'i bar ma dor gnas pa kha dog lta bu'o //
analyzed: yang de nyid kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / de gnyi ga'i bar ma dor gnas pa kha dog lta bu'o //
translated: It is also like a color, whether good or bad, or a color that is neither good nor bad.

original: grogs gang zhe na /
analyzed: grogs gang zhe na /
translated: What is its companion?

original: de dang lhan cig 'byung zhing mtshungs par ldan pa sems las byung ba'i chos rnams te /
analyzed: de dang lhan cig 'byung zhing mtshungs par ldan pa sems las byung ba'i chos rnams te /
translated: It is the mental factors that arise and are active at the same time as it is.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are:

original: yid la byed pa dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems pa'o //
analyzed: yid la byed pa dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems pa'o //
translated: attention, contact, feeling, conception, and volition.

original: sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gang dag mig gi rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung zhing mtshungs par ldan pa de dag ni /
analyzed: sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gang dag mig gi rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung zhing mtshungs par ldan pa de dag ni /
translated: There are other mental factors that arise and are active at the same time as visual consciousness.

original: dmigs pa gcig pa rnam pa du ma ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa gcig pa rnam pa du ma ste /
translated: They have the same point of reference, but they are not the same.

original: lhan cig 'byung ba dag kyang re re 'byung la /
analyzed: lhan cig 'byung ba dag kyang re re 'byung la /
translated: They arise together, but they are not the same.

original: thams cad kyang rang gi sa bon las nges par 'byung ba /
analyzed: thams cad kyang rang gi sa bon las nges par 'byung ba /
translated: All are definitely derived from their own seeds.

original: mtshungs par ldan pa /🔽dmigs pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: mtshungs par ldan pa / dmigs pa dang bcas pa /
translated: They are associated.🔽They have an object.

original: rnam pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: rnam pa dang bcas pa /
translated: They have an aspect.

original: gnas dang bcas pa dag go //
analyzed: gnas dang bcas pa dag go //
translated: They have a location.

original: las gang zhe na /
analyzed: las gang zhe na /
translated: What is action?

original: de ni rnam pa drug tu blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: de ni rnam pa drug tu blta bar bya ste /
translated: It should be seen as having six aspects:🔽First, the present consciousness of the eye, etc., is the action of the support of the present eye, etc., because it is their support.🔽It is the action of the object of the present eye, etc., because it is the object of the present eye, etc.🔽It is the action of the aspect of the present eye, etc., because it is the aspect of the present eye, etc.🔽It is the action of the consciousness of the present eye, etc., because it is the consciousness of the present eye, etc.

original: thog ma kho nar de rang gi yul la dmigs pa rnam par rig pa'i yul las dang / yang rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par rig pa dang / yang da ltar gyi dus rnam par rig pa dang ; yang skad cig gcig rnam par rig pa dang /🔽yang rnam pa gnyis kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: thog ma kho nar de rang gi yul la dmigs pa rnam par rig pa'i yul las dang / yang rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par rig pa dang / yang da ltar gyi dus rnam par rig pa dang ; yang skad cig gcig rnam par rig pa dang / yang rnam pa gnyis kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'jug pa ste /
translated: It is the action of the present eye, etc., because it is the present eye, etc.🔽It is the action of the present world realm, because it is the present world realm.🔽It is the action of the present time, because it is the present time.🔽It is the action of the present moment, because it is the present moment.🔽It is the action of the present life, because it is the present life.🔽It is the action of the present world realm, because it is the present world realm.🔽It is the action of the present time, because it is the present time.🔽It is the action of the present moment, because it is the present moment.🔽It is the action of the present life, because it is the present life.🔽It is the action of the present world realm, because it is the present world realm.🔽It is the action of the present time, because it is the present time.🔽It is the action of the present moment, because it is the present moment.🔽It is the action of the present life, because it is the present life.🔽It is the action of the present world realm, because it is the present world realm.🔽It is the action of the present time, because it is the present time.🔽It is the action of the present moment, because it is the present moment.

original: dge ba nyon mongs pa can gyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / las kun las slong ba'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / yang sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i 'bras bu yongs @3b su 'dzin pa ste las drug pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba nyon mongs pa can gyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / las kun las slong ba'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / yang sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i 'bras bu yongs @3b su 'dzin pa ste las drug pa'o //
translated: It is the action of the present life, because it is the present life.🔽It is the action of the present world realm, because it is the present world realm.🔽It is the action of the present time, because it is the present time.🔽It is the action of the present moment, because it is the present moment

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is auditory consciousness?

original: gang rna ba la brten nas sgra so sor rnam par rig pa'o //
analyzed: gang rna ba la brten nas sgra so sor rnam par rig pa'o //
translated: It is the intimation which is produced by the ear and sound.

original: gnas gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnas gang zhe na /
translated: What is its basis?

original: rna ba ni lhan cig 'byung ba'i gnas so //
analyzed: rna ba ni lhan cig 'byung ba'i gnas so //
translated: The ear is its simultaneous basis.

original: yid ni de ma thag pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: yid ni de ma thag pa'i gnas so //
translated: The mental organ is its immediate basis.

original: sa bon thams cad pa kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de nyid ni sa bon gyi gnas so //
analyzed: sa bon thams cad pa kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de nyid ni sa bon gyi gnas so //
translated: The store-consciousness, which contains all the seeds, is its genetic basis.

original: rna ba gang zhe na /🔽gang 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag rgyur byas pa /
analyzed: rna ba gang zhe na / gang 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag rgyur byas pa /
translated: What is the ear?

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rten po gzugs dang ba ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rten po gzugs dang ba ste /
translated: It is the sensitivity which is derived from the four great elements and is the basis of auditory consciousness.

original: bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: It is invisible and offers resistance.

original: yid dang sa bon gyi rnam par dbye ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: yid dang sa bon gyi rnam par dbye ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The mental organ and the seeds should be understood as in the case of visual consciousness.

original: dmigs pa gang zhe na /🔽sgra rnam pa du ma bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa dag ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa gang zhe na / sgra rnam pa du ma bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa dag ste /
translated: What is its object?🔽It is sound, which is invisible and offers resistance.

original: 'di lta ste /

original: de la nges pa'i sems phan chad nas /
analyzed: de la nges pa'i sems phan chad nas /
translated: From the determination of the object onward,

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar 'gyur bar blta'o //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar 'gyur bar blta'o //
translated: one should understand that there is defilement or purification.

original: de nas de'i rgyu mthun pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa yang /
analyzed: de nas de'i rgyu mthun pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa yang /
translated: Then, the visual consciousness that is similar to the previous one

original: dge ba dang mi dge bar 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: dge ba dang mi dge bar 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: The mental consciousness is virtuous or nonvirtuous,

original: rang gi rtog pa'i dbang gis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi rtog pa'i dbang gis ni ma yin no //
translated: but not by its intrinsic nature.

original: ji srid du yid de gzhan la rnam par g-yengs bar ma gyur pa de srid du yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa gnyi ga dge ba 'am /
analyzed: ji srid du yid de gzhan la rnam par g-yengs bar ma gyur pa de srid du yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa gnyi ga dge ba 'am /
translated: As long as the mental consciousness is not distracted to something else, the mental consciousness and the eye consciousness are both virtuous or

original: nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur ro //
translated: both nonvirtuous.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa byung ba na /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa byung ba na /
translated: When the eye consciousness arises,🔽the mental consciousness is either distracted to something else or it is not.🔽If it is distracted to something else, then the mental consciousness is either virtuous or nonvirtuous, but not by its intrinsic nature.🔽If it is not distracted to something else, then the mental consciousness and the eye consciousness are both virtuous or both nonvirtuous.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: The same should be understood as the case with the arising of the ear consciousness and so on up to the arising of the body consciousness.

original: de la gnas ni yul gzhan du 'gro ba'i bzhon pa bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la gnas ni yul gzhan du 'gro ba'i bzhon pa bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
translated: The basis should be regarded as being like a conveyance for traveling to another place.

original: rnam par shes @5b pa'i tshogs lnga po dag ni grogs rnams ni 'gron po 'grogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes @5b pa'i tshogs lnga po dag ni grogs rnams ni 'gron po 'grogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: The five collections of consciousness are like travelers who accompany each other.

original: dmigs pa ni bya ba'i don lta bu'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa ni bya ba'i don lta bu'o //
translated: The object is like the purpose of the journey.

original: las ni rang gi nus pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: las ni rang gi nus pa lta bu'o //
translated: The action is like one’s own ability.

original: rnam grangs gzhan du na /
analyzed: rnam grangs gzhan du na /
translated: Another way of explaining this is as follows.

original: de dag gi gnas ni khyim na gnas pa'i khyim lta bur blta'o //
analyzed: de dag gi gnas ni khyim na gnas pa'i khyim lta bur blta'o //
translated: Their abode is like the home of a householder.

original: dmigs pa ni longs spyod lta bu'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa ni longs spyod lta bu'o //
translated: Their object is like wealth.

original: grogs ni bran dang bran mo la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: grogs ni bran dang bran mo la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: Their companions are like servants and maids.

original: las ni rtsol ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: las ni rtsol ba lta bu'o //
translated: Their activity is like work.

original: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga dang ldan pa'i sa ste dang po'o /
analyzed: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga dang ldan pa'i sa ste dang po'o /
translated: This is the first stage of the Yogācārabhūmi.

original: // / yid kyi sa gang zhe na /
analyzed: // / yid kyi sa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the stage of mentation?

original: de yang rnam pa lnga kho nar blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa lnga kho nar blta bar bya ste /
translated: It should be understood as having five aspects:

original: ngo bo nyid dang / gnas dang / dmigs pa dang / grogs dang / las so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid dang / gnas dang / dmigs pa dang / grogs dang / las so //
translated: nature, abode, object, companions, and activity.

original: de la ngo bo nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ngo bo nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is its nature?

original: sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is mind, mentation, and consciousness.

original: sems gang zhe na /
analyzed: sems gang zhe na /
translated: What is mind?

original: sa bon thams cad dang ldan pa dang / gnas kyi dngos por gyur pa dang / gnas kyi dngos por gnas pa dang / len par byed pa rnam par smin par bsdus pa kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: sa bon thams cad dang ldan pa dang / gnas kyi dngos por gyur pa dang / gnas kyi dngos por gnas pa dang / len par byed pa rnam par smin par bsdus pa kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the storehouse consciousness, which contains all the seeds, is the basis of the other consciousnesses, and is the appropriating consciousness.

original: yid gang zhe na /
analyzed: yid gang zhe na /
translated: What is the mental faculty?

original: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug po dag 'gags ma thag pa gang yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ma rig pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / sred pa'i mtshan nyid kyi nyon mongs pa rnam pa bzhi dang rtag tu ldan pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug po dag 'gags ma thag pa gang yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ma rig pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / sred pa'i mtshan nyid kyi nyon mongs pa rnam pa bzhi dang rtag tu ldan pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the immediately preceding cessation of the six groups of consciousness, and it is always associated with the four afflictions which are the afflicted view of a self, the afflicted view of holding to an extreme, self-conceit, and craving.

original: rnam par shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is consciousness?

original: dmigs pa rnam par rig par byed pas nye bar gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa rnam par rig par byed pas nye bar gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the awareness of the object.

original: gnas gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnas gang zhe na /
translated: What is the basis?

original: yid de ma thag pa'i gnas dang / snga ma bzhin du sa bon thams cad pa kun gzhi rnam par shes pas sa bon gyi gnas so //
analyzed: yid de ma thag pa'i gnas dang / snga ma bzhin du sa bon thams cad pa kun gzhi rnam par shes pas sa bon gyi gnas so //
translated: It is the immediately preceding cessation of the mental faculty, and it is the basis of the store-consciousness which contains the seeds of all things.

original: dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the object?

original: chos thams cad ni dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni dmigs pa ste /
translated: All things are objects.

original: 'ba' zhig gi tshor ba'i phung po dang / 'du shes kyi phung po dang / 'du byed gyi phung po dang / 'dus ma byas dang / bstan du med cing thogs pa med pa'i gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / sa bon thams cad do //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig gi tshor ba'i phung po dang / 'du shes kyi phung po dang / 'du byed gyi phung po dang / 'dus ma byas dang / bstan du med cing thogs pa med pa'i gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / sa bon thams cad do //
translated: the aggregate of feeling, the aggregate of perception, the aggregate of formations, the unconditioned, the form that is invisible and non-resistant, the six sense-spheres, and all the seeds.

original: grogs gang zhe na /
analyzed: grogs gang zhe na /
translated: What is a companion?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

analyzed: yid la byed pa dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems pa dang / 'dun pa dang / mos pa dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / dad pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang /
translated: attention, contact, feeling, perception, intention, aspiration, memory, concentration, wisdom, faith, shame,

translated: hatred,

analyzed: khong khro ba dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / lta ba dang / the tshom dang / khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / sgyu dang /

analyzed: yang skad cig pas rgyu rnam par rig par byed pa'o //

original: rgyu mthun pa kun nas slong ba'i phyir ro //
